Package controllers

Class UserCTRL

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserCTRL
public class UserCTRL extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related operations in the BTO system.

Handles user authentication, user data loading/saving, password changes, and navigation to role-specific menus and views.

  • Method Details

    • loadUserData

      public void loadUserData()
      Loads user data from the CSV repository into the user list.

    • saveUserData

      public void saveUserData()
      Saves the current user list to the CSV repository. If the user list is not loaded, it attempts to load it first.

    • createNewAccount

      public void createNewAccount(Scanner sc)
      The `createNewAccount` function in Java prompts the user to input details for a new account, validates the input, creates an `Applicant` object, and saves it using an `ApplicantCSVRepository`.
      Parameters:
      sc - The `sc` parameter in the `createNewAccount` method is of type `Scanner`. It is used to read input from the user during the account creation process. The `Scanner` class in Java is used for obtaining input of primitive types like int, double, etc., and strings from the

    • runCentralMenu

      public void runCentralMenu(Scanner sc, UserCTRL userCTRL)
      Runs the central menu for the currently logged-in user, displaying options and routing to the appropriate controllers and views based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for user input.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance (usually this).

    • handleChangePassword

      public void handleChangePassword(Scanner sc, UserCTRL userCTRL)
      Handles the password change process for the current user. Prompts for current password, new password, confirmation, and updates it after validation.
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object for user input.
      userCTRL - The UserCTRL instance.

    • login

      public boolean login(String NRIC, String password)
      Attempts to log in a user with the given NRIC and password. Sets the current user if successful.
      Parameters:
      NRIC - The NRIC of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise.

    • updateFilterSettings

      public void updateFilterSettings(User me, String filterCsv)
      Updates the filter settings for the current user and persists the change.
      Parameters:
      me - The user whose filter settings are to be updated (can be derived from currentUser).
      filterCsv - The new filter settings in CSV format.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String currentPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the current user's password after verifying the current password and validating the new password's complexity. Logs out the user after a successful change.
      Parameters:
      currentPassword - The user's claimed current password.
      newPassword - The desired new password.
      Returns:
      true if the change succeeded, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Gets the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current User, or null if no user is logged in.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to set as the current user.

    • getUserByNRIC

      public User getUserByNRIC(String nric)
      Retrieves a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User with the specified NRIC, or null if not found.
